qas.question: What a cappella group rose to popularity in 1943?
What was boycotted by American musicians in 1943?
Who is credited for first introducing elements of Jazz into a cappella?

answers.text: The Hi-Los and the Four Freshmen

qas.question: What number one song was covered by an a cappella group in 1983?
During and after the 80's, what helped a cappella music rise in popularity?

plausible_answers.text: The Hi-Los and the Four Freshmen

qas.question: Who introduced jazz harmonies to a capella in the 40's?
What number one hit did Yazoo have in 1983?
What did The Song Spinners have in the 1950's?

plausible_answers.text: "Comin' In On A Wing And A Prayer"

qas.question: What was the name of The Song Spinners best seller in the 1950's?
When did the American Federation of Musicians introduce jazz to a cappella?

plausible_answers.text: interest in small-group a cappella performances

qas.question: In 1983 what did The King's Singers promote?
What did A cappella gain in July 1943?

context: In July 1943, as a result of <b5_0>the American Federation of Musicians<b5_0/> boycott of <a1_0>US recording studios<a1_0/>, the a cappella vocal group <a0_0>The Song Spinners<a0_0/> had <b9_0>a best-seller<b9_0/> with <b10_0>"Comin' In On A Wing And A Prayer"<b10_0/>. <b11_0>In the 1950s<b11_0/> several recording groups, notably <a2_0><b6_0>The Hi-Los and the Four Freshmen<b6_0/><a2_0/>, introduced complex jazz harmonies to a cappella performances. The King's Singers are credited with promoting <b12_0>interest in small-group a cappella performances<b12_0/> in the 1960s. In 1983 an a cappella group known as The Flying Pickets had a Christmas 'number one' in the UK with a cover of Yazoo's (known in the US as Yaz) <a3_0>"<b7_0>Only You<b7_0/>"<a3_0/>. <b8_0>A cappella music<b8_0/> attained <b13_0>renewed prominence<b13_0/> from the late 1980s onward, spurred by <a4_0>the success of Top 40 recordings<a4_0/> by artists such as The Manhattan Transfer, Bobby McFerrin, Huey Lewis and the News, All-4-One, The Nylons, Backstreet Boys and Boyz II Men.[citation needed]
